Type Definitions

sizesOfDrawer

List of all available options for each mode of each toolbar
Type:
  • Object
Properties:
Name Type Description
width Number width of Drawer
height Number height of drawer
scrollTop Number "Top" position including scrollTop value of parent elements
scrollLeft Number "Left" position including scrollLeft value of parent elements
top Number Absolute value of "top" position
left Number Absolute value of "left" position
Source:
